hero.title: Cocovoit
hero.subtitle: Applying Agile & Scrum methodology to a rideshare app project

overview.label: Context
overview.title: A workshop to practice Agile
overview.description: This project involved designing a rideshare application while rigorously applying the Scrum framework. The learning objective: practice iterative sprints, prioritization, task breakdown, and team organization.
overview.challenge: The real challenge wasn't the app design, but mastering the Agile process: transforming a product vision into a structured backlog planned in sprints, collaborating with 5 other team members.

methodology.label: Methodology
methodology.title: Agile process in 4 phases
methodology.intro: Rigorous application of the Scrum framework with successive iterations and continuous prioritization.

phases.title: Phase 1: Research & Discovery
items: Creation of 3 personas representing typical users
Collective brainstorming session to identify needs
Affinity Mapping: organizing needs into 5 categories (Economic, Practical, Social, Alternative, Value)

phases.title: Phase 2: Product Backlog & Prioritization
items: Transforming needs into User Stories (standard Agile format)
Applying the MoSCoW method to prioritize features
Should Have / Could Have: progressive improvements
Won't Have: out of project scope

phases.title: Phase 3: Sprint Planning
items: Breaking down user stories into actionable technical tasks
Example: User Story 'Real-time ride sharing' → Technical task 'Create sharing feature with contact selection'

phases.title: Phase 4: Review & Iteration
items: Sprint 1 Review: identifying improvements and adjustments
Backlog enrichment with new user stories
Added features: favorite addresses, time flexibility, identity verification, facial recognition

role.label: My role
role.title: Contribution to the Scrum team
role.intro: Active participation in all phases of the Agile process.

contributions.title: Research & Ideation
contributions.description: Participated in brainstorming and user needs categorization via Affinity Mapping

contributions.title: User Stories Writing
contributions.description: Transformed identified needs into user stories following standard Agile format

contributions.title: MoSCoW Prioritization
contributions.description: Contributed to collective feature prioritization with the team

contributions.title: Technical Breakdown
contributions.description: Broke down features into actionable tasks for sprints

contributions.title: Scrum Collaboration
contributions.description: Coordinated with Scrum Master for sprint planning and task distribution

learnings.label: Skills
learnings.title: Demonstrated skills
learnings.intro: This project allowed me to practice key Product Management and Agile project management skills.

skills.title: Scrum Framework

skills.title: MoSCoW Prioritization
skills.description: Ability to prioritize features based on user value and project constraints to maximize ROI

skills.title: User Stories & Backlog

skills.title: Agile Teamwork

skills.title: Product Thinking
